text: ‘Anarɨra e gamima, e ikiava, aruava egha ikɨrɨmɨrim isi.’ Ezɨ ian fofozir gumazir mabara kamaghɨn mɨkeme, ‘E Godɨn boribara.’(17:28) Pol gumazir kaba an akam deravɨra agɨfoghasa, egha a men fomɨra itir Grighɨn gumazibar akar otevir pumuning isa, uan akam gavgavim a danɨngasa, aning gun me mɨgei.
